question: a starts business with rs . 35000 and after 5 months , b joins with a as his partner . after a year , the profit is divided in the ratio 2 : 3 . what is b ’ s contribution in the capital ?
a circle in the coordinate plane passes through points ( - 3 , - 2 ) and ( 2 , 4 ) . what is the smallest possible area of that circle ?
in what ratio should a variety of rice costing rs . 6 per kg be mixed with another variety of rice costing rs . 8.75 per kg to obtain a mixture costing rs . 7.50 per kg ?
if 20 men can build a water fountain 56 metres long in 6 days , what length of a similar water fountain can be built by 35 men in 3 days ?
a take twice as much time as b or thrice as much time to finish a piece of work . working together , they can finish the work in 4 days . b can do the work alone in ?

from an island , it is possible to reach the mainland by either ferry p or ferry q . ferry p travels for 3 hours at 8 kilometers per hour , while ferry q takes a route that is three times longer . if ferry p is slower than ferry q by 1 kilometer per hour , how many hours longer is the journey of ferry q compared with the journey of ferry p ?
a cricketer scored 142 runs which included 12 boundaries and 2 sixes . what percent of his total score did he make by running between the wickets .
if two sides of a triangle have lengths 3 and 8 , which of the following could be the perimeter of the triangle ? i . 9 ii . 15 iii . 19
the length of a room is 5.5 m and width is 3.75 m . what is the cost of paying the floor by slabs at the rate of $ 500 per sq . metre .
a reduction of 23 % in the price of salt enables a lady to obtain 10 kgs more for rs . 100 , find the original price per kg ?
company p had 15 percent more employees in december than it had in january . if company p had 450 employees in december , how many employees did it have in january ?
what will be the compound interest on a sum of rs . 23,000 after 3 years at the rate of 12 % p . a . ?
r is the set of positive odd integers less than 50 , and s is the set of the squares of the integers in r . how many elements does the intersection of r and s contain ?
the area of a triangle is with base 3 m and height 6 m ?

harold and millicent are getting married and need to combine their already - full libraries . if harold , who has 1 / 2 as many books as millicent , brings 1 / 3 of his books to their new home , then millicent will have enough room to bring 1 / 3 of her books to their new home . what fraction of millicent ' s old library capacity is the new home ' s library capacity ?

a certain car dealership sells economy cars , luxury cars , and sport utility vehicles . the ratio of economy to luxury cars is 3 : 2 . the ratio of economy cars to sport utility vehicles is 5 : 3 . what is the ratio of luxury cars to sport utility vehicles ?
8 : 4 seconds : : ? : 4 minutes
sales price is $ 60 , gross profit is 140 % of cost , what is the value of gross profit ?
find the average of all prime numbers between 4 and 15 .
john purchased a grinder and a mobile for rs . 15000 & rs . 10000 respectively . he sold the grinder at a loss of 4 % and the mobile phone at a profit of 10 % . overall how much he make a profit .
16.036 divided by 0.04 gives :
if rs . 595 be divided among a , b , c in such a way that a gets 2 / 3 of what b gets and b gets 1 / 4 of what c gets , then their shares are respectively ?
what is the remainder when 6 ^ 381 is divided by 5 ?
marts income is 60 percent more than tims income and tims income is 50 percent less than juans income . what percentage of juans income is marts income
what is the hcf of 2 / 3 , 5 / 9 and 6 / 5

at a florist shop on a certain day , all corsages sold for either $ 25 or $ 40 . if 8 of the corsages that sold for $ 30 had instead sold for $ 20 , then the store ' s revenue from corsages that day would have been reduced by 40 percent . what was the store ' s actual revenue from corsages that day ?
if $ 5,000 is invested in an account at a simple annual rate of r percent , the interest is $ 250 . when $ 19,000 is invested at the same interest rate , what is the interest from the investment ?
find the value of ( 19 + 43 / 151 ) × 151
a man can row 4 kmph is still water . if the river is running at 2 kmph it takes 90 min to row to a place and back . how far is the place
30 square stone slabs of equal size were needed to cover a floor area of 50.7 sq . m . find the length of each stone slab ?

a broker invested her own money in the stock market . during the first year , she increased her stock market wealth by 50 percent . in the second year , largely as a result of a slump in the stock market , she suffered a 30 percent decrease in the value of her stock investments . what was the net increase or decrease on her overall stock investment wealth by the end of the second year ?
if a person walks at 12 km / hr instead of 10 km / hr , he would have walked 20 km more . the actual distance traveled by him is :
45 men took a dip in a water tank 40 m long and 20 m broad on a religious day . if the average displacement of water by a man is 4 m 3 , then the rise in the water level in the tank will be :
a typist uses a sheet measuring 20 cm by 30 cm lenghtwise . if a margin of 2 cm is left on each side and a 3 cm margin on the top and bottom , then what is the percentage of page used by the typist ?

a is the average ( arithmetic mean ) of the first 7 positive multiples of 6 and b is the median of the first 3 positive multiples of positive integer n . if the value of a ^ 2 – b ^ 2 is zero , what is the value of n ?
a pipe can fill a cistern in 44 minutes . find the time in which 1 / 11 part of the cistern will be filled ?

working together , printer a and printer b would finish the task in 40 minutes . printer a alone would finish the task in 60 minutes . how many pages does the task contain if printer b prints 4 pages a minute more than printer a ?
a small , rectangular park has a perimeter of 560 feet and a diagonal measurement of 400 feet . what is its area , in square feet ?
a horse chases a pony 8 hours after the pony runs . horse takes 12 hours to reach the pony . if the average speed of the horse is 320 kmph , what s the average speed of the pony ?
what is the number of integers from 1 to 500 ( inclusive ) that are divisible by neither 10 nor by 15 ?
the average weight of a , b and c is 45 kg . if the average weight of a and b be 40 kg and that of b and c be 43 kg , what is the weight of b ?

a certain bacteria colony doubles in size every day for 21 days , at which point it reaches the limit of its habitat and can no longer grow . if two bacteria colonies start growing simultaneously , how many days will it take them to reach the habitat ’ s limit ?

the population of a town increases 20 % and 25 % respectively in two consecutive years . after the growth the present population of the town is 1500 . then what is the population of the town 2 years ago ?
the sum of two consecutive number is 109 . which is the larger number ?
find the slope of the line perpendicular to the line y = x - 7
two employees x and y are paid a total of rs . 580 per week by their employer . if x is paid 120 percent of the sum paid to y , how much is y paid per week ?
a shopkeeper bought 600 oranges and 400 bananas . he found 15 % of oranges and 8 % of bananas were rotten . find the percentage of fruits in good condition .
find 94 × × 97
a can do a work in 4 days . b can do the same work in 6 days . both a & b together will finish the work and they got $ 1000 from that work . find their shares ?

a furniture manufacturer has two machines , but only one can be used at a time . machine e is utilized during the first shift and machine b during the second shift , while both work half of the third shift . if machine e can do the job in 12 days working two shifts and machine b can do the job in 15 days working two shifts , how many days will it take to do the job with the current work schedule ?
